data.eml:eml: Paepalanthus rectifolius, a new name in Eriocaulaceae (Poales)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Echternacht, Livia, Trovo, Marcelo, Sano, Paulo Takeo (2012): Paepalanthus rectifolius, a new name in Eriocaulaceae (Poales). PhytoKeys 10: 7-12, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.10.2591, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.10.2591
